article_title: blog.aids.gov − 2016 National Ryan White Conference Deadlines Approaching
article_text:
By Amy Schachner, Health Communication Specialist, HIV/AIDS Bureau, Health Resources and Services Administration, U.S. Department of Health and Human Services

The April 29 deadline for submitting abstracts for a workshop or poster at the 2016 National Ryan White Conference on HIV Care and Treatment is quickly approaching. The conference will take place August 23-26 in Washington, DC. Visit RyanWhite2016.org to learn more about the abstract submission process.

You can also learn more about the conference as well as register online . Space is limited. Registration closes on July 25.

Stay on top of all National Conference news and important updates by following us on Twitter at @RyanWhite2016
